content: abbreviations and symbols the detailed photo tutorial can be found in the photo tutorials part p 13 symbols abbreviations chain - chain mc - magic_ring ij - invisible join* slip_stitch - slip_stitch fpslst - front-post slip_stitch mij - modified invisible join* single_crochet - single_crochet fptc - front-post treble_crochet increase - increase ex increase double_crochet - increase half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet tc3cluster* - 3 tc with the with double_crochet increase single_crochet - increase with single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet same base and top blo - back loop only* tc - treble_crochet dc3cluster* - 3 double_crochet with the flo - front loop only* rs - right side same base and top tlo - third loop only* ws - wrong side dc2cluster* - 2 double_crochet with the *described on the photo tutorials same base and top what do you need materials this tutorial us terms yarn / cord crochet hook scissors what did i use description of yarn yarn material yarnart macrame fibre 85% cotton | 15% polyester cotton 788 - 2mm thickness worsted/aran & hook hook 3 5 mm yardage/meterage 246 yds | 225m grams 250g colors final size width 15 cm / 5 9 in plants green height 15 cm / 5 9 in square brown 3 empty granny square time 30 min square full center difficulty 1/5 graph yardage square grams 35 g yardage 35 yds metrage 30m note a single_crochet and chain at the beginning of the round are equivalent to a double_crochet stitch note slip_stitch blo at the end of the round is made into the first double_crochet of the round skipping written pattern the single_crochet chain round 0 mc round 1 single_crochet chain double_crochet tc double_crochet 3 x3 tc double_crochet slip_stitch blo total 16 round 2 single_crochet chain double_crochet in the same stitch chain 2 fptc chain 2 increase double_crochet in the next stitch double_crochet in the next stitch increase double_crochet in the next stitch chain 2 x3 fptc chain 2 increase double_crochet in the next stitch double_crochet in the next stitch slip_stitch blo total 24 chains not included round 3 single_crochet chain double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x5 double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 x3 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x4 slip_stitch blo total 40 chains not included round 4 single_crochet chain double_crochet in the next stitch double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x9 double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 x3 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x7 slip_stitch blo total 56 chains not included round 5 single_crochet chain double_crochet in the next stitch x2 double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet in the next stitch x13 double_crochet 2 into chain space chain 2 x3 fptc chain 2 double_crochet 2 into chain space double_crochet
